title: Athlas
paragraph: A being of perfect form, the crown of creation! The {{ Dark Desert # article/islands/dark-desert }} is the habitat of the Athlas. In this inhospitable region he evolved and reached his max strength.

dynamicContents.content: The Athlas is effective against {{ Nyxi # article/units/nyxi }}, {{ Teryx # article/units/teryx }}, {{ Ovivi # article/units/ovivi }} and {{ Raider Naki # article/units/raider-naki }}.

He is strong, he is fast and he looks terrifying. All you need to dominate the world of Rise in Time. The Athlas can be used in all situations and is the only unit who is effective against all of the special units.

Despite his strength, the Athlas is not unbeatable. The {{ Forest Spirit # article/units/forest-spirit }} and {{ Grass Spirit # article/units/grass-spirit }}, but most important the {{ Elder Spirit # article/units/elder-spirit }} can be very efficient opponents to stop the Athlas.
But the greatest hurdle to recruit a lot of Athlas is the Dark Desert itself. A player has to invest a lot to obtain a Dark Desert and clear the ash fields around the portal.
